body:
@rsc Hm. Looks like that example passed with no problem.

```
 ‚ù± ./readdirbug 
mkdir /tmp/readdirbug
create /tmp/readdirbug/file1

opendir /tmp/readdirbug
readdir: found .
readdir: found ..
readdir: found file1
readdir: EOF
readdir: EOF
readdir: EOF
closedir

opendir /tmp/readdirbug
readdir: found .
readdir: found ..
readdir: found file1
readdir: EOF
rm /tmp/readdirbug/file1
readdir: EOF
readdir: EOF
closedir
ok - everything worked
```
